title: Create Vendor Registration Form UI
description: Develop the multi-step registration form UI for vendors in the React web application, including all fields for business details, contact info, and legal documents.
sprint_goal: Establish core vendor onboarding and profile management functionality.
acceptance_criteria: UI matches design specs; All fields are present; Client-side validation is implemented.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests passing; UI is responsive and accessible.
testing_requirements: Unit testing with React Testing Library, E2E testing with Cypress.
deployment_notes: Deploy as part of the vendor dashboard frontend.
business_value: Enables new vendor acquisition by providing the entry point to the platform.

title: Implement Backend API for Vendor Registration
description: Develop the NestJS API endpoint to handle vendor registration submissions, including data validation, document upload to S3, and creation of a new vendor record with 'pending_verification' status.
sprint_goal: Establish core vendor onboarding and profile management functionality.
acceptance_criteria: API successfully creates a vendor record; Documents are securely uploaded to S3; Duplicate mobile/GST numbers are rejected.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests passing; API is secured and documented.
testing_requirements: Unit and Integration testing with Jest/Supertest.
deployment_notes: Requires S3 bucket and IAM roles to be provisioned.
business_value: Provides the backend logic for new vendor acquisition.

title: Implement Vendor Login with OTP
description: Develop the complete OTP-based login flow for vendors, including UI, backend API for OTP generation/validation, and integration with AWS Cognito and SNS.
sprint_goal: Establish core vendor onboarding and profile management functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Active vendor can log in with correct OTP; Non-active vendors are blocked; Security features like rate limiting are implemented.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; E2E tests passing; Security review completed.
testing_requirements: E2E testing for login flow, security testing for rate limiting.
business_value: Provides secure, passwordless access for vendors to the platform's management tools.

title: Create Admin UI for Pending Registrations
description: Develop the admin dashboard UI to display a filterable and sortable list of pending vendor and rider registrations.
sprint_goal: Establish core vendor onboarding and profile management functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view a paginated list of all users with 'pending_verification' status; Filtering by role works correctly.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests passing; UI is responsive.
testing_requirements: Unit testing with React Testing Library.
deployment_notes: Part of the admin dashboard application.
business_value: Provides the entry point for the vendor and rider onboarding workflow.

title: Implement Backend API for Registration Approval
description: Develop the NestJS API endpoint for an administrator to approve a pending vendor or rider registration, changing their status to 'active'.
sprint_goal: Establish core vendor onboarding and profile management functionality.
acceptance_criteria: API changes user status to 'active'; Action is logged in the audit trail; Notification is sent to the user.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests passing; API is secured and documented.
deployment_notes: Requires Admin RBAC to be in place.
business_value: Enables the growth of the vendor and rider network by acting as the final quality gate.

title: Implement Customer Registration with OTP
description: Develop the full-stack feature for new customer registration using their mobile number and OTP verification, as per REQ-FUN-001 and CUS-001.
sprint_goal: Deliver core customer onboarding and product discovery features.
acceptance_criteria: New user can register with a valid Indian mobile number; OTP is sent and verified; A new customer account is created with 'verified' status.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; E2E tests passing for registration flow; Security review of OTP mechanism complete.
testing_requirements: E2E testing on both iOS and Android.
deployment_notes: Requires Cognito User Pool for customers.
business_value: Enables new user acquisition by providing a secure entry point to the platform.

title: Implement Search Backend with OpenSearch
description: Set up Amazon OpenSearch, create an indexing pipeline for vendor and product data, and develop the backend search API that supports partial matching and typo tolerance.
sprint_goal: Deliver core customer onboarding and product discovery features.
acceptance_criteria: Search API returns relevant results for store and item names; Typo tolerance is functional; P95 latency is under 500ms.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Performance tests passing; Indexing pipeline is automated.
deployment_notes: Requires OpenSearch cluster provisioning and configuration.
business_value: Increases order conversion by reducing the time required to find desired products.

title: Implement CSV Bulk Import Backend Orchestration
description: Develop the backend APIs and SQS queuing mechanism for the vendor bulk import feature. Includes generating pre-signed S3 URLs and triggering the asynchronous worker.
sprint_goal: Enable scalable vendor catalog management through bulk import/export.
acceptance_criteria: API provides secure upload URL; Upload triggers an SQS message with correct payload; Job status is tracked in the database.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests for S3/SQS interaction are passing; API is documented.
testing_requirements: Integration testing with AWS SDK mocks.
deployment_notes: Requires SQS queue and IAM roles to be provisioned.
business_value: Reduces vendor onboarding time and effort, especially for those with large inventories.
